  <div style="text-align: left;">[[TableOfContents|Table of Contents]] | [[Cassandra_ColumnFamily_Parameters|Previous]] | [[Doradus_REST_API_Parameters|Next]] | [[Index|Index]]</div>
  <div style="color: #999999; font-family: sans-serif; font-size: 10pt; text-align: left;">
    <span>[[Doradus_Configuration_and_Operation|Doradus Configuration and Operation]]</span> : <span>[[Doradus_Configuration_Files|Doradus Configuration Files]]</span> : <span>[[Configuration_Parameters_in_doradus.yaml|Configuration Parameters in doradus.yaml]]</span> : Cassandra Connection Parameters</div>
  <hr />
  <div style="color: #4F81BD; font-family: &quot;Museo For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; font-style: italic; font-weight: bold; margin-bottom: 0pt; margin-top: 10pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0WI0HA">Cassandra Connection Parameters</span></div>
  <div style="font-family: &quot;Museo Sans For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0VI0HA">These parameters control connections to the Cassandra database using the primary (Thrift) API:</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0UI0HA">dbhost: 'localhost'</span></div>
  <div style="font-family: &quot;Museo Sans For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 36pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0TI0HA">This parameter configures the host name(s) or address(es) of the Cassandra node(s) that the Doradus server connect to. Static IP addresses are preferred over host names. If a comma-separated list of hosts is provided, Doradus will connect to each one in round-robin fashion, allowing load balancing and failover.</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0SI0HA">dbport: 9160</span></div>
  <div style="font-family: &quot;Museo Sans For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 36pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0RI0HA">This is the Cassandra Thrift API port number. Change this value if Cassandra’s RPC (Thrift) port is using something other than 9160. (Cassandra should use the same port on all nodes.)</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0QI0HA">jmxport: 7199</span></div>
  <div style="font-family: &quot;Museo Sans For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 36pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0PI0HA">Change this value if Cassandra’s JMX port is using something other than 7199. (Cassandra should use the same port on all nodes.)</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0OI0HA">dbauthenticator:</span></div>
  <div style="font-family: &quot;Museo Sans For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 36pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0NI0HA">As described in section </span><span style="font-weight: bold;">[[Using_a_Secured_Thrift_API|0]]</span><span style="font-weight: bold;"> </span>[[Using_a_Secured_Thrift_API|Using a Secured Thrift API]], this parameter should be set to the fully qualified class name of the authenticator class to use when the Cassandra Thrift API is configured to require authentication. The default is null, which means no authentication.</div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0MI0HA">db_timeout_millis: 60000</span></div>
  <div style="font-family: &quot;Museo Sans For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 36pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0LI0HA">This is the socket-level Cassandra database (Thrift) connection timeout in milliseconds. This time is used both when connecting to Cassandra and when performing read/write operations. If a connect, read, or write request is not received within this time, the connection is closed and a retry is initiated. Note, however, that Cassandra has its own RPC timeout value, which defaults to 10 seconds. This means that read and write operations will typically based on Cassandra’s value and not this one.</span></div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0KI0HA">db_connect_retry_wait_millis: 30000</span></div>
  <div style="font-family: &quot;Museo Sans For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 36pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0JI0HA">This is the Cassandra database (Thrift) initial connection retry wait in milliseconds. If an initial connection to Cassandra times-out (see </span><span style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">db_timeout_millis</span> above), Doradus waits this amount of time before trying again. Doradus keeps retrying indefinitely under the assumption that Cassandra may take a while to start.</div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0II0HA">max_commit_attempts: 10</span></div>
  <div style="font-family: &quot;Museo Sans For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 36pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0HI0HA">This is the maximum number of times Doradus will attempt to perform a Cassandra update operation before aborting the operation. (See also </span><span style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">retry_wait_millis</span>).</div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0GI0HA">max_read_attempts: 3</span></div>
  <div style="font-family: &quot;Museo Sans For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 36pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0FI0HA">This is the maximum number of times Doradus will attempt to perform a read operation before aborting the operation. (See also </span><span style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">retry_wait_millis</span>).</div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0EI0HA">max_reconnect_attempts: 3</span></div>
  <div style="font-family: &quot;Museo Sans For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 36pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0DI0HA">This is the maximum number of times Doradus will attempt to reconnect to Cassandra after a failure. A reconnect is performed if a read or update call fails. (See also </span><span style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">retry_wait_millis</span>).</div>
  <div style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 18pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0CI0HA">retry_wait_millis: 5000</span></div>
  <div style="font-family: &quot;Museo Sans For Dell Regular&quot;; font-size: 11pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; margin-left: 36pt; margin-top: 12pt;"><span id="wwpID0E0BI0HA">This is the time in milliseconds that Doradus waits after a failed update, read, or reconnect request call to Cassandra. This time is multiplied by the attempt number, which means Doradus waits a little longer after each successive failed call. (See also </span><span style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">max_commit_attempts</span>, <span style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">max_read_attempts</span>, and <span style="color: #4A442A; font-family: Consolas; font-size: 9.5pt; font-style: normal; font-weight: normal;">max_reconnect_attempts</span>.)</div>
</div>
